SEARCH
Package com.example.quacks_app

Class EntrantsMap

java.lang.Object
com.example.quacks_app.EntrantsMap
public class EntrantsMap extends Object
The EntrantMap class uses a built-in Android class to display a map, and then add markers representing each entrant.

  • Constructor Summary

    EntrantsMap(android.content.Context context, org.osmdroid.views.MapView mapView)

  • Constructor Details

    • EntrantsMap

      public EntrantsMap(android.content.Context context, org.osmdroid.views.MapView mapView)
      Initialize the map
      Parameters:
      context - The current activity
      mapView - The map layout file

  • Method Details

    • addMarker

      public void addMarker(double latitude, double longitude, String title, String description, android.graphics.drawable.Drawable icon)
      Adds a single marker to the map with the specified settings
      Parameters:
      latitude - The latitude of the marker to be added
      longitude - The longitude of the marker to be added
      title - The title to display when the marker is selected
      description - The description to display under the title when the marker is selected
      icon - The icon that is displayed on the map

    • addMarkers

      public void addMarkers(List<org.osmdroid.util.GeoPoint> points, List<String> titles, List<String> descriptions, android.graphics.drawable.Drawable icon)
      Adds multiple markers to the map at once. The order of each of the lists must match
      Parameters:
      points - A list of the coordinates
      titles - A list of the titles
      descriptions - A list of the descriptions
      icon - The icon to use for all markers

    • centerMap

      public void centerMap(double latitude, double longitude, int zoomLevel)
      Centers the map on the given point
      Parameters:
      latitude - The latitude to center on
      longitude - The longitude to center on
      zoomLevel - The amount of zoom (a larger value is more zoomed in)

    • clearMarkers

      public void clearMarkers()
      Removes all markers from the current map.
